updatePlannedPaymentDate.placeholder: Enter the date you plan to pay this invoice
updatePlannedPaymentDate.statusRestriction: The Update Planned Payment date only applies to "Overdue", "Not Paid" and "Partially Paid" status.
updatePlannedPaymentDate.tooltip: To be populated with a future date on when payment is expected to be made to DNV for this invoice
updatePlannedPaymentDate.warning: Changing this date does not automatically change the payment due date.
